translation: I am grateful before You, living and enduring Sovereign, for You have returned my soul to me with compassion; abundant is Your faithfulness.
Blessed are You... who commanded us concerning the washing of the hands.
notes: A moment to prepare for the day with intention.

hebrew: שְׁמַע יִשְׂרָאֵל ה' אֱלֹהֵינוּ ה' אֶחָד
translitAshkenazi: Shema Yisroel Adonoy Eloheinu Adonoy echod
translitSephardi: Shema Yisrael Adonai Eloheinu Adonai echad
translation: Hear, O Israel: the Eternal is our God, the Eternal is One.
notes: A declaration of unity and love.

translation: You shall love the Eternal your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your might.
notes: An invitation to align heart and actions before rest.

translation: Hear our voice, Eternal One; have compassion and mercy upon us.
notes: Taking stock mid-day with honesty and hope.
